00010 : SimpleSocket( UNIX, type, protocol)

00013 void UnixSocket::connect( const std::string& foreignPath)
00014 {
00015     if( !isValidPath(foreignPath) )
00016         throw SocketException("foreignPath is too big", false);
00017 
00018     sockaddr_un addr;
00019     addr.sun_family = AF_LOCAL;
00020     std::strcpy( addr.sun_path, foreignPath.c_str());
00021 
00022     if( ::connect( m_socket, (sockaddr*) &addr, sizeof(addr)) < 0)
00023         throw SocketException("Connect failed (connect)");
00024 }
00025 
00026 void UnixSocket::bind( const std::string& localPath)
00027 {
00028     if( !isValidPath(localPath) )
00029         throw SocketException("localPath is too big", false);
00030 
00031     sockaddr_un addr;
00032     addr.sun_family = AF_LOCAL;
00033     std::strcpy( addr.sun_path, localPath.c_str());
00034     ::unlink( addr.sun_path);
00035 
00036     if( ::bind( m_socket, (sockaddr*) &addr, sizeof(addr)) < 0)
00037         throw SocketException("Set of local path failed (bind)");
00038 }
00039 
00040 std::string UnixSocket::getLocalPath() const
00041 {
00042     sockaddr_un addr;
00043     socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
00044 
00045     if( getsockname( m_socket, (sockaddr*) &addr, &addr_len) < 0)
00046         throw SocketException("Fetch of local path failed (getsockname)");
00047 
00048     return extractPath( addr, addr_len);
00049 }
00050 
00051 std::string UnixSocket::getForeignPath() const
00052 {
00053     sockaddr_un addr;
00054     socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
00055 
00056     if( getpeername( m_socket, (sockaddr*) &addr, &addr_len) < 0)
00057         throw SocketException("Fetch of foreign path failed (getpeername)");
00058 
00059     return extractPath( addr, addr_len);
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool UnixSocket::isValidPath( const std::string& path)
00063 {
00064     if( path.size() >= 104) return false;
00065     else return true;
00066 }
00067 
00068 std::string UnixSocket::extractPath( const sockaddr_un& addr, socklen_t len)
00069 {
00070     return std::string( addr.sun_path, len - sizeof(sa_family_t) - 1);
00071 }
